member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBEventSource
member.summary: EventSource event emitted from the project.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBMetricsExporterOptions
member.summary: InfluxDB exporter options.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBMetricsExporterOptions.Endpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets HTTP/S destination for line protocol.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBMetricsExporterOptions.Org
member.summary: Gets or sets name of InfluxDB organization that owns the destination bucket.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBMetricsExporterOptions.Bucket
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of InfluxDB bucket to which signals will be written.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBMetricsExporterOptions.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication token for InfluxDB.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBMetricsExporterOptions.MetricsSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets the chosen metrics schema to write.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBMetricsExporterOptions.FlushInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to wait at most (milliseconds) with the write.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBMetricsExporterOptions.MetricExportIntervalMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the metric export interval in milliseconds. The default value is 60000.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.MetricsSchema
member.summary: The OpenTelemetry->InfluxDB conversion schema.

member.name: F:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.MetricsSchema.None
member.summary: No schema selected. Default schema will be used.

member.name: F:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.MetricsSchema.TelegrafPrometheusV1
member.summary: Represents the Telegraf Prometheus V1 schema. This option converts OpenTelemetry metrics to the first version of the Telegraf Prometheus schema. - Telegraf/InfluxDB measurement per Prometheus metric - Fields `count`/`sum`/`gauge`/etc contain metric values.

member.name: F:OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.MetricsSchema.TelegrafPrometheusV2
member.summary: Represents the Telegraf Prometheus V2 schema. This option converts OpenTelemetry metrics to the second version of the Telegraf Prometheus schema. - One measurement `prometheus` - Fields (Prometheus metric name) + `_` + `count`/`sum`/`gauge`/etc contain metric values.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Metrics.InfluxDBExporterExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for for using InfluxDB.

member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Metrics.InfluxDBExporterExtensions.AddInfluxDBMetricsExporter(OpenTelemetry.Metrics.MeterProviderBuilder,System.Action{OpenTelemetry.Exporter.InfluxDB.InfluxDBMetricsExporterOptions})
member.summary: Adds InfluxDB exporter to the TracerProvider.
member.param: builder to use.
Callback action for configuring .
member.returns: The instance of to chain the calls.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Internal.Guard
member.summary: Methods for guarding against exception throwing values.

member.summary: Throw an exception if the value is null.
member.param: The value to check.
The parameter name to use in the thrown exception.

member.summary: Throw an exception if the value is null or empty.

The parameter name to use in the thrown exception.

member.summary: Throw an exception if the value is null or whitespace.

The parameter name to use in the thrown exception.

member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Internal.Guard.ThrowIfZero(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Throw an exception if the value is zero.
member.param: The value to check.
The message to use in the thrown exception.
The parameter name to use in the thrown exception.

member.summary: Throw an exception if the value is not considered a valid timeout.

The parameter name to use in the thrown exception.

member.name: M:OpenTelemetry.Internal.Guard.ThrowIfOutOfRange(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Throw an exception if the value is not within the given range.
member.param: The value to check.
The parameter name to use in the thrown exception.
The inclusive lower bound.
The inclusive upper bound.

The name of the upper bound.
An optional custom message to use in the thrown exception.

member.summary: Throw an exception if the value is not of the expected type.
